remarks.format: ## Remarks 比較一般性類別不查閱行動的組件中的型別名稱。The more generic class does not look up the type names in the mobile assembly. 因此，以啟用行動裝置相關的命名空間中的型別名稱轉換已建立的類別。Therefore, the class was created to enable type-name conversion in the mobile-related namespaces.
